      @Query(value="SELECT *\nFROM auditoria\nWHERE tabela = :tabela\n AND data_hora BETWEEN :dataInicio AND :dataFim\n AND CAST(dados_novos AS TEXT) LIKE %:campo%\n", nativeQuery=true) List<Auditoria> findByCampo(@Param("tabela") String tabela, @Param("campo") String campo, @Param("dataInicio") LocalDateTime dataInicio, @Param("dataFim") LocalDateTime dataFim)
